Name: Cave Bear
Tactics: • If the cave bear is on the same tile as a Hero, it attacks each hero on that tile with a frenzy of claws.
• If the cave bear is within 1 tile of a Hero, it moves adjacent to the closest Hero and attacks with a leaping strike.
• Otherwise, the cave bear moves 1 tile toward the closest Hero.

Name: Duergar Guard
Tactics: • If the duergar is adjacent to a Hero, it attacks the Hero with a warhammer.

• If the duergar is on a tile with no Heroes and an unexplored edge, draw a dungeon tile from the bottom of the stack and place it next to the duergar's tile. Draw a Monster Card and place its figure on that tile.
• Otherwise, the duergar moves 1 tile toward the closest Hero.

Name: Gibbering Mouther
Tactics: • If the gibbering mouther is within 1 tile of a Hero, it attacks all Heroes within 1 tile.
• Otherwise, the gibbering mouther moves 1 tile toward the closest Hero.

Name: Grell
Tactics: • If the grell is adjacent to a Hero, it attacks that Hero with a venomous bite.
• If the grell is within 1 tile of a Hero, it moves adjacent to the closest Hero and attacks with its tentacles.
• Otherwise, the grell moves 1 tile toward the closest Hero.

Name: Human Cultist
Tactics: • If the cultist is within 1 tile of a Hero, it moves adjacent to the closest Hero and attacks with a poisoned dagger.
• Otherwise, the cultist moves 1 tile toward the closest Hero.

Name: Kobold Dragonshield
Tactics: • If the kobold is adjacent to a Hero, it attacks with a sword.
• If the kobold is on a tile with no Heroes and an unexplored edge, draw a Dungeon Tile from the bottom of the stack and place it next to the Kobold's tile. Place a new Monster on that tile.
• Otherwise, the kobold moves 1 tile toward the closest Hero.

Name: Legion Devil
Extra information: When placing the Legion Devil, place two additional Legion Devils next to the first. You do not gain experience for this card until all Legion Devils are destroyed.
Tactics: • If the legion devil is within 1 tile of a Hero, it moves adjacent to the closest Hero and attacks with a sword.
• Otherwise, the legion devil moves 1 tile toward the closest Hero.

Name: Orc Archer
Tactics: • If the orc archer is adjacent to a Hero, it attacks the Hero with a punch.
• If the orc archer is within 2 tiles of a Hero, it attacks the closest Hero with an arrow.
• Otherwise, the orc archer moves 1 tile toward the closest Hero.

Name: Orc Smasher
Tactics: • If the orc smasher is within 1 tile of a Hero, it moves adjacent to the closest Hero and attacks with a heavy mace.
• Otherwise, the orc smasher moves 1 tile toward the closest Hero.

Name: Snake
Tactics: • If the snake is within 1 tile of a Hero, it moves adjacent to the closest Hero and attacks with a venomous bite.
• Otherwise, the snake moves 1 tile toward the closest Hero.
